channel.title: PI quest

item.title: PI quest
item.dc:creator: @Mill Mill
item.description:
@Mill wrote:

Heres what I have now:

[code=java] if(itemId == 4151 && npcId == 466)
{
c.getItems().deleteItem(4151, 1);
c.getPA().startTeleport(2525, 4776, 0, “modern”);
c.sendMessage(“You hear odd noises coming from the north-west.”);
c.sendMessage(“Maybe you should head that way and check it out.”);
} else {
c.sendMessage(“Hmm…”);
}

            if(itemId == 995 && npcId == 866 && c.clawLaws == 0)
			{
            if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(995,20000000));
            c.getItems().deleteItem(995, 20000000);
            c.getItems().addItem(14484, 1);
            c.getPA().startTeleport(2962, 3381, 0, "modern");
            c.sendMessage("You have completed quest: The Claw Law");
            c.sendMessage("Maybe you should head that way and check it out.");
            c.clawLaws = 1;
            } else {
                            c.sendMessage("You need 20 million coins, or this quest may have been completed.");
                    }
            }[/code]

And the compiler error is:

item.title: PI quest
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

[quote=“Pzezima2, post:2, topic:397720”][code=java] if(itemId == 4151 && npcId == 466)
{
c.getItems().deleteItem(4151, 1)
c.getPA().startTeleport(2525, 4776, 0, “modern”);
c.sendMessage(“You hear odd noises coming from the north-west.”);
c.sendMessage(“Maybe you should head that way and check it out.”);
} else {
c.sendMessage(“Hmm…”);
}

	if(itemId == 995 && npcId == 866)
                      {
	if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(995,20000000) {
	c.getItems().deleteItem(995, 20000000)
	c.getItems().addItem(14484, 1);
	c.getPA().startTeleport(2962, 3381, 0, "modern");
	c.sendMessage("You have completed quest: The Claw Law");
	c.sendMessage("Maybe you should head that way and check it out.");
	c.clawLaws = 1;
	} else {
			c.sendMessage("You need 20 million coins!");
		}
	}[/code]

Try that^[/quote]

Yes try that. Also please post the compile error.

Read full topic

item.title: PI quest
item.dc:creator: @Mill Mill
item.description:
@Mill wrote:

Hmm making a quest for dclaws and I get a compiling error with these two things:

[code=java] if(itemId == 4151 && npcId == 466)
c.getItems().deleteItem(4151, 1)
c.getPA().startTeleport(2525, 4776, 0, “modern”);
c.sendMessage(“You hear odd noises coming from the north-west.”);
c.sendMessage(“Maybe you should head that way and check it out.”);
} else {
c.sendMessage(“Hmm…”);
}
}

	if(itemId == 995 && npcId == 866)
	if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(995,20000000) {
	c.getItems().deleteItem(995, 20000000)
	c.getItems().addItem(14484, 1);
	c.getPA().startTeleport(2962, 3381, 0, "modern");
	c.sendMessage("You have completed quest: The Claw Law");
	c.sendMessage("Maybe you should head that way and check it out.");
	c.clawLaws = 1;
	} else {
			c.sendMessage("You need 20 million coins!");
		}
	}[/code]

I think I am not correctly placing “}”… Please help?

Read full topic
